description:
Exciting Opportunity: Strategic Partnerships Director for USBN - Unleash Your Sales Talents in Sports Advertising and Sponsorship!

About Us:

Join the dynamic team at United States Basketball Network (USBN), the fastest-growing network dedicated to professional basketball outside the NBA in the United States. Our mission is to elevate top pro teams and players, offering a unique platform for unparalleled growth. Learn more about our vibrant community at www.usbn.pro

Why This Role Matters:

As the Strategic Partnerships Director, you'll be at the forefront of driving revenue through sports advertising and sponsorships, shaping the future of the USBN. We are looking for self-starters who understand the power of brand partnerships, possess a data-driven mindset, and excel in building and maintaining relationships with national partners.

Our Unique Culture:

At USBN, we provide you with the freedom to succeed and define your role. This is not just a job; it's a chance to enhance your resume, prove your skills, and chart your own path to success. Your performance determines your position and pay.

Your Impact - Functions and Responsibilities:
• Generate revenue through strategic advertising and marketing partnerships, amplifying brand awareness and driving product or service sales.
• Develop and implement national/regional plans for mission-aligned partnerships.
• Build and maintain strong relationships with strategic partners, fostering mutual benefits.
• Create and implement innovative marketing campaigns to achieve partners' business goals.
• Pitch creative sponsorship opportunities to internal and external stakeholders.
• Represent USBN at events, engaging with attendees, coordinating support, and developing new relationships.
• Collaborate on due diligence research, financial analysis, and risk assessments for partnership plans.
• Measure success through reports and analytics, tracking partnership benchmarks, KPIs, and ROIs.
• Utilize CRM programs to track and optimize sales and marketing activities.
• Manage the Partnerships Program budget efficiently.

Requirements - Key Skills and Qualifications:
• Must be a skilled closer with a proven track record in sales.
• Experience in sports advertising, sponsorships, business development, or related fields is essential.
• Ability to connect with decision-makers and understand partnership dynamics.
• Familiarity with basketball, sports marketing, advertising, media, and naming rights.
• Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite: Excel, Word, Teams.

Location and Physical Requirements:
• Must have permanent work authorization in the United States.
• Remote work from anywhere in the contiguous United States.
• Occasional travel required for customer engagements.
• Ability to work at a desk and on a computer for most of the day.

Time Commitment:
• Full-time, part-time, second job, gig, or hobby – your commitment defines your success.

Don't miss this chance to be part of an exhilarating journey with USBN. Apply now and turn your passion for sales into an amazing career opportunity!
